name: PCI-DSS Lite Framework
description: Simplified Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard framework covering essential requirements for protecting cardholder data.

framework.name: PCI-DSS Lite Framework
framework.description: Essential PCI-DSS requirements for payment card data protection

structure.title: Build and Maintain a Secure Network

items.title: Req 1: Install and maintain firewall configuration
items.description: Install and maintain a firewall configuration to protect cardholder data
questions: Are firewalls deployed at all network boundaries?
Is there a firewall rule review process?

items.title: Req 2: Do not use vendor-supplied defaults
items.description: Do not use vendor-supplied defaults for passwords and security parameters
items.summary: Change all default credentials and settings

structure.title: Protect Cardholder Data
structure.description: Requirements for protecting stored and transmitted cardholder data

items.title: Req 3: Protect stored cardholder data
items.description: Protect stored cardholder data using encryption, truncation, masking, and hashing
items.summary: Minimize and protect stored card data
questions: Is cardholder data encrypted at rest?

items.title: Req 4: Encrypt transmission of cardholder data
items.description: Encrypt transmission of cardholder data across open, public networks
questions: Is email transmission of PANs prohibited?

items.title: Req 5: Use and update anti-virus software
items.description: Use and regularly update anti-virus software or programs
questions: Is anti-virus deployed on all systems?

items.title: Req 6: Develop and maintain secure systems
items.description: Develop and maintain secure systems and applications
questions: Is there a secure development lifecycle?

structure.title: Implement Strong Access Control Measures
structure.description: Requirements for restricting access to cardholder data

items.title: Req 7: Restrict access to cardholder data
items.description: Restrict access to cardholder data by business need to know
items.summary: Limit access to those who need it
questions: Is access based on job function?
Is there a least privilege policy?

items.title: Req 8: Assign unique ID to each person
items.description: Assign a unique ID to each person with computer access
questions: Does everyone have a unique ID?

structure.title: Monitor and Test Networks
structure.description: Requirements for monitoring access and testing security

items.title: Req 10: Track and monitor access
items.description: Track and monitor all access to network resources and cardholder data

items.title: Req 11: Test security systems regularly
items.description: Regularly test security systems and processes
